title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for building scalable web applications using React, TypeScript, and modern frontend technologies. Experience with state management (Redux), testing frameworks, and CI/CD pipelines is required.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Join our dynamic team as a Full Stack Developer. You will work on both frontend and backend development using Python, Django, React, and PostgreSQL. Experience with REST APIs, database design, and cloud platforms (AWS) is preferred.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: We are seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to develop and deploy ML models. You should have experience with Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, data preprocessing, and model deployment. Knowledge of deep learning, NLP, and MLOps is highly valued.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Join our DevOps team to build and maintain our cloud infrastructure. Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, CI/CD pipelines, and monitoring tools is required. Knowledge of Linux, scripting, and automation is essential.

title: Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a Data Scientist to analyze large datasets and build predictive models. Experience with Python, pandas, scikit-learn, SQL, and statistical analysis is required. Knowledge of big data tools and visualization is a plus.
